history.proof: intros n. strivial use: Reflect.Nat_eqb_eq unfold: is_true.

exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat Unable to unify "true" with "(fix eqb (n m : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => match m with | 0 => true | S _ => false end | S n' => match m with | 0 => false | S m' => eqb n' m' end end) n n".

original: intros n. unfold Nat.eqb. destruct n. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. reflexivity.
